Israel's D9 bulldozer, a tool of destruction in Gaza
subhead: Imported by the dozens from the United States, Israel has redesigned Caterpillar D9 bulldozers to play a dual strategic and political role: protecting soldiers entering Gaza and leveling the enclave.

title: Trump administration seeks to review status of Afghans living in the US after attack on National Guard soldiers
subhead: Two service members deployed in Washington, DC remain in critical condition after being targeted by an Afghan national who arrived in the US in 2021, according to authorities. Donald Trump accused the Biden administration of allowing Afghans to enter the country without proper vetting during the fall of Kabul to the Taliban.

title: New tax hikes for the UK's middle class
subhead: Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves unveiled significant tax increases during her budget presentation on Wednesday, November 26. She faced the difficult task of reassuring both the markets and Labour MPs.

title: Why our old clothes end up in the UAE
subhead: The country has emerged as a leader in sorting secondhand clothing, taking advantage of Europe's inability to process its own stockpiles. This outsourcing comes with clear environmental and social costs.

title: Forgotten Louvre security report highlighted specific balcony used by crown jewel thieves
subhead: Le Monde has learned that a 2018 security audit explicitly identified the balcony used by the thieves as a point of vulnerability, even noting the possibility that a freight lift could be used to access it.

title: Paris shops are squeezed by overtourism and real estate speculation
subhead: Between the needs of residents and the desire to attract tourists, commerces in the French capital have to strike a delicate balance. Failing to do so can be detrimental, as seen by the decline of the BHV department store.
